attributes.action: change road speed on California Road, Maddiston, Falkirk from 60mph to 30mph
attributes.additional_details: this road is going through middle of a number of farms and has an entry to a local country park which has a entry on a blind bend. This road is used by dog walkers, children, horse ridders on a day to day basis... the reduction of speed would help save more peoples life's and reduce the risk of accidents.
attributes.background: to have this roads speed changed to make it more safe for livestock, walkers, horse riders and people accessing the local country Park. Speed from 60mph to 30mph

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
